title: Timelapse (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_timelapse_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: TIMELAPSE
Genre: Adventure - FPP - Puzzle
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: September 30, 1996
Size: 1.4 GB
Company: GTE Entertainment / Night Dive Studios
Rating:	ESRB Rating: Everyone
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/timelapse

About:
Your friend Professor Nichols has gone missing. Armed with the archeologist's journal you set out on a journey that will take you to places - and times - you haven't even dreamt of.
Timelapse is a classic puzzle-adventure game that has been compared to the famous Myst.
You will travel through five breathtaking, faithfully-recreated, 3D worlds of ancient Egypt, Maya, Easter Island, Anasazi, and the mythical city of Atlantis. Each world will put your puzzle-solving skills to the test, before giving away its secrets. Can you solve all the puzzles and unravel the final mystery - that of the fabled sunken lost city of Atlantis?
Prepare yourself for the journey, the time gate has re-openedâ€¦
Intriguing story that blends fact with fiction
Over 50 indigenous and challenging puzzles (from audio-based to mechanical to mathematical)
Immersive non-linear gameplay with multiple story endings

Minimum system requirements - Windows: XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
Hard Drive: 2 GB HDD 
Mouse, Keyboard
